Yuanyuan, Kassy, and I will be attending the [2024 HiTOP Conference](https://www.personality.org/events/2024-hitop-conference) in San Diego this weekend. Our presentations are below. See you there!

- Yang, Y., Gray, K., Sprunger, J. G., & Girard, J. M. (2024). *Exploring the structure of personality symptoms in a trauma-exposed community sample.* Poster presented at the Hierarchical Taxonomy of Psychopathology (HiTOP) Conference, San Diego, CA.

- Gray, K. & Girard, J. M. (2024). *Is personality related to social well-being? Associations between social health measures and personality pathology dimensions.* Poster presented at the Hierarchical Taxonomy of Psychopathology (HiTOP) Conference, San Diego, CA.

- Girard, J. M., Chung, Y., Ravichandran, C., Ongur, D., Cohen, B. M., & Baker, J. T. (2024). *Transdiagnostic structure of affective and non-affective psychosis symptoms.* Paper presented at the Hierarchical Taxonomy of Psychopathology (HiTOP) Conference, San Diego, CA.
